The Twenty-Third Patriarch of Mount Mao’s Shangqing Lineage, Master Guanmiao Zhu Ziying, presents *The Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture*

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture*
**Full Title:** *The Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture in Thirty-Nine Chapters*

Tradition holds that in the third year of the Xingning reign of the Eastern Jin (365 CE), the Shangqing Immortals, led by Lady Wei, descended to transmit this scripture to the Daoist Yang Xi, making it the foundational text of the Shangqing lineage. The original comprised a single scroll. The extant version, preserved in the Mao Mountain lineage’s altar edition, spans six scrolls. It was collated by the Southern Song Shangqing Patriarch Jiang Zongying and finalized by the early Ming Zhengyi Celestial Master Zhang Yuchu.

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Cavern Perfection Division, Original Texts Category.

*Preface to the Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture*

Master Zhu Ziying of the Twenty-Third Generation of Maoshan Shangqing Lineage, the Master Who Contemplates the Wondrous, states:

The Dao arises from Non-Being, abiding in the hidden numinous yet unfathomable;
The spirit congeals in Emptiness, wondrously transforming the myriad changes without fixed form.
In the profound obscurity, essence abides, and in supreme tranquility, radiance emerges;
In the boundless Great Mystery, one attains Emptiness and preserves Stillness—
This is called the *Great Cavern*.

When essence is gathered and spirit is concentrated, one rides the primordial qi in cyclic rotation;
When spirit is refined and the Dao is realized, auspicious winds are set in motion and dance.
From Non-Being, Being suddenly arises, and through breath, the myriad spirits’ forms disperse;
When movement reaches its extreme, stillness returns, and in the indistinct, the wondrous unity of the Imperial One is encircled—
This is called the *Cyclic Wind Unified*.

It is the root of universal propagation for Heaven and Earth, the origin of creation for emperors and sages.
Humans are born, receiving qi from the Supreme Ultimate, their movement and stillness patterned after Heaven and Earth;
They originate in the One Primordial, their opening and closing embodying Yin and Yang.
Thus, the Thirty-Nine August Lords of Shangqing reflect their true forms downward, entering the thirty-nine portals within the adept’s body.
Each portal, according to its corresponding passage, bears one chapter of the scripture.
Its words are profound and abstruse, serving to command the hundred spirits, summon the true, and repel the false—
What is called "auspicious clouds open the Gate of Life, and propitious mists seal the Portal of Death" refers to this.

Therefore, the Central Yellow Elder of the Primordial Essence Dao Lord synthesized the esoteric intentions of the host of sages and compiled the *True Scripture of the Great Cavern*, hence its name: *The Thirty-Nine Chapters Scripture*.
Additionally, there are the *Cyclic Wind Imperial One*, the *Lofty Primordial Mighty One*, and the *Five Elders Feminine One*—these three scriptures serve to supplement the venerable *Thirty-Nine Chapters*.

The Dao possesses three marvels:
The first marvel is the *True Scripture of the Great Cavern in Thirty-Nine Chapters*;
The second marvel is the *Precious Scripture of the Five Elders Feminine One*;
The third marvel is the *Wondrous Scripture of the Vast and Subtle Primordial Numinosity*.

Thus, the *Thirty-Nine Chapters* is the esoteric formula of the Nine Heavens, the foremost scripture of the Supreme Primordial Lord, inscribed in golden characters.
It is also called the *Dragon Script of the Three Heavens* and the *True Dao Scripture of the Nine Heavens*.
This scripture was composed by the Primordial Heavenly King, who circulated qi across the ten directions of the Mysterious Subtle.
The Queen Mother of the West received the Dao from the Primordial Heavenly King and, together, they inscribed it in the Northern Primordial Heaven, in the Land of Luyena, upon the Spirit Mirror Mountain of the Bird-Men, within the Grotto of Shelai.
In a chamber of Emptiness, they gathered the qi of the Ninefold Mysterious Unity, coalescing it into a book. The characters measured a *zhang* in height, and it remains preserved to this day.
The Primordial Heavenly King further transmitted it to the Central Yellow Elder of the Eight Perfected of Shangqing, instructing him to teach it to those below who would become true persons and ascend to the Three Luminaries.

This scripture was concealed and guarded by the Central Yellow Elder, unknown to the world. Thus, in the mortal realm, upon the Five Sacred Peaks and within the celestial precincts of Heaven, it has never been present.
The Perfected of the Shangqing Heaven treasure and secrete it; only in the Great Mystery are there golden pavilions and jade tablets, purple slips and cinnabar records.
In the Three Origins, there are the *Secret Registers of the Conjoined Dawn*; in the Cinnabar Terrace, the yellow characters of the scripture.
Only those destined to become true persons may receive it.

This scripture is the banner of the Dao of the Supreme August, the wondrous text of the Purple Dawn.
It governs the ranks of the Nine Heavens, summons the numinous powers of the Five Emperors,
Unifies the *Cyclic Wind* in its primordial harmony, coagulates the ninefold transmutations in mysterious essence,
Conjoins the feminine and masculine, unites the myriad spirits,
Arrayed in profound solemnity, resonating with the jade tones of the Great Perfected.
It dispels the false in the Luminous Beam, communicates the mutable in the Mysterious Gate,
Penetrates virtue to attain the wondrous, washes radiance to illumine the clouds.
The Great Han becomes the qi of the Numinous Pass; the Boundless becomes the years of the Vast Kalpa.
Majestic are the spirit halls, the abyss of the myriad Perfected;
Resplendent the golden chambers, flourishing in the Shangqing Heaven.

Its purport is subtle and profound, difficult to exhaust in detail.
If the adept can maintain long-term purification, severing worldly attachments,
Recite the jade chapters in the secluded chamber, and invoke the jade tones to stir the numinous,
Then the true person’s register will be established in the Eastern Florescence,
The Seven Mysteries will be further refined in the Purple Chamber,
The Demon Kings will be subdued by numinous might,
The Five Emperors will be harnessed to guard the body.
After ten thousand recitations, the fleshly body will ascend;
After seven invocations, the Controller of Destiny will arrive.
These are the marvelous chapters of the *Great Cavern*, which gather the myriad Dao to return to life.
Without extraordinary feathers or anomalous forms, without golden bones or jade names,
None may rashly peruse the numinous text—its prohibitions strictly follow the *Luminous Regulations of the Nine Perfected*.

The adept must undergo three years of arduous purification before being permitted to read it.
Upon completing ten thousand recitations of these chapters, the Central Yellow Elder Dao Lord will memorialize above,
And the Supreme Lord will command the cinnabar-gale chariot with its green canopy,
While the Nine Numinous Envoys and the Controller of Destiny of the Great Unity come to welcome the adept.
Thus, the Five Elders will flank the carriage, the Eight Winds will fan their feathers,
Divine thunder will lead the way, jade splendor will support the wheels.
Riding clouds and driving dragons, the adept will ascend to Heaven that very day,
Proceeding to the palace of the Three Primordial Lords of the Supreme Simplicity to receive the scripture.
This is called ascending to the Shangqing Heaven, receiving the scripture in the Supreme Ultimate,
And being appointed as the Left Minister of the Lofty Immortals.

If the adept merely possesses this scripture but does not recite it,
The Heavenly Emperor of the Supreme Tenuity will strike the adept’s name from the Register of Death.
At the outset of scripture transmission, the true register is established;
At the beginning of the purification rite, the Supreme Ultimate is invoked to inscribe the name in the Eastern Florescence.
A memorial is presented to the Supreme Lord, and the name is recorded in the Tortoise Terrace.
The myriad spirits and thousand numina will then address the adept as the *Grand Master of the Nine Mysteries*,
Ranking equivalent to the *Immortal Earl of the Supreme Purity*.

The protocols for receiving the scripture strictly adhere to the *Luminous Regulations of the Nine Perfected*; the adept should comply accordingly.

**Postface**
The *Book of Changes* states: "Great indeed is the Primal Qi of Qian! All things owe their beginning to it."
It further states: "The Dao of Qian transforms and changes, each attaining its proper nature and destiny. Preserving and uniting the Great Harmony, only then is there benefit and correctness."
The earlier scholars explained: "What is called *yuan*? It is that which cannot be spoken—perhaps the state before Yin and Yang took form."
What Heaven bestows is *ming* (destiny); what beings receive is *xing* (nature).
Nature and destiny are wondrous; only by preserving and uniting the Great Harmony can there be benefit and correctness.
The *Great Cavern Scripture* fundamentally concerns the return to the origin and the restoration of destiny.
Those who discuss it in the world all say: "The Dao is wondrous in Emptiness and Non-Being; the spirit is hidden in the sudden arising of Being."

Before heaven and earth existed, this Dao already was. The disciples of the Mo and Si schools spoke of Confucius, saying: "His nature and the Dao of Heaven—these could not be heard." Yet this Dao is none other than the wondrous subtlety of "only the refined, only the unified," transmitted heart-to-heart by the Three Sages—Yao, Shun, and Yu—each in unbroken accord, never for an instant apart. By the Spring and Autumn period, as the age declined and customs decayed, it was regarded as something loftily impracticable, leaving people at a loss, and so the Master seldom spoke of it. Yet when Yanzi sat in forgetfulness and Zengzi responded with singular devotion, did they hear anything different? The purport of this scripture is to preserve the heart and nurture nature in serving Heaven, to gather essence and unite spirit in harmonizing with the Dao—entirely consistent with the Master’s teaching that "when you grasp it, it remains; when you release it, it vanishes."

Since the Yellow and Lao Lords of the Central Realm withdrew into seclusion, the world has known nothing of this. Thus, among the earthly realms of humanity and the five sacred mountains, this scripture has vanished forever. Later generations, never hearing of the Great Dao, have abandoned themselves to the sea of desires, drowning their aspirations in the dusty waves. How pitiable are those who would preserve the Great Harmony and rectify nature and destiny!

At the Shangqing Ancestral Altar of Mount Mao, transmission has spanned over a thousand years, yet only thirty-eight individuals have received it. For it reveals the hidden truths of heaven and earth before form arose and dissects the mysteries of the union of father and mother’s essences—thus it must remain concealed, never lightly or carelessly passed on.

In the second lunar month of the Xianchun reign, the Perfected Master of Jade Ocean’s Profound Mystery visited Jiuhua Mountain. While visiting a Daoist chamber, he spoke of this matter, and few were those who heard. Fearing its imminent extinction, he wished to broaden its transmission. I, Gongduan, bound by the green threads of three lifetimes’ karmic practice, received the Master’s instruction and, overwhelmed with gratitude, commissioned this carving in wood to fulfill his intent, sharing it with scholars across the world. May those who treasure this text, pledging their hearts before Heaven in transmission, vow to practice it and thus flourish this Dao.

On the fifteenth day of the first lunar month in the ren-shen year of the Xianchun reign, the Dharma-heir Cheng Gongduan reverently inscribed this with burning incense.

What is bestowed upon beings as nature and destiny is at once vast and minute, light and weighty, boundless in its presence and absence—yet never apart from the Dao, all may be seen and sought. Thus, one who attains the self becomes enlightened, then knows that heaven, earth, and the ten thousand things are but a single entity. That which is empty, numinous, and wondrous—do I not possess it? Since I possess it, it may be seen and sought. Why should it not share the same endowment as the vast and minute, the light and weighty, without ever being obscured?

What is called a *scripture* of the Dao arises from the sound of celestial truth, the text of the Three Qi. None but the Perfected Immortals of the Supreme Emperor expound it before transmitting it to the world below. Its sound is heard in the absence of sound; its text takes form in the absence of form. It divides at the beginning of the primordial chaos, yet its unfolding and nurturing manifestations may be heard and perceived—hence it is called a *scripture*.

To unlock the treasury within oneself, to expound the scripture within oneself, to reveal its most profound truths and dispel the obstructions of the benighted—is it not that every being possesses this scripture? The *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern* comprises thirty-nine chapters, all concerning the principles of refinement. Those who practice it to completion—such as Wei, Yang, Guo, and Xu—attest to this.

Some ascend to the lofty void, some penetrate to luminous clarity; some are meticulous in ritual observance, some nourish themselves through ingestion—each method has its similarities and differences, and none may be casually pursued. For the path of refinement must be rooted in nurturing qi and preserving spirit. Only after dispelling external distractions and dissolving thoughts does qi congeal and spirit transform. When all things and concerns are severed, and not even a hair’s breadth of obstruction remains, one returns to the primordial chaos. Thus, hunger and thirst vanish, birth and extinction cease. One roams with the clouds drifting through the sky, coming and going without limit.

When such scriptures circulate in the world, those of reverent virtue must consider broadening their transmission. At its core, the intention to preserve goodness is one and the same.

The Daoist Xiong Changyi of Min, who has sought the Dao for years, sponsored the carving of this scripture and requested a preface. Alas! Many know the scripture as the Dao and follow it, yet few truly practice its Way. The teachings established by the Most High extend their grace to all creatures, enduring through countless generations without cease—such is their origin. How many can truly believe in themselves and diligently cultivate it? Those who believe and cultivate—what hinders them from attaining the scripture? How much more does it transcend the bounds of existence and non-existence, its numinous wonders far exceeding what the scripture alone conveys!

Holders of this scripture should take heed of these words.

The Orthodox Unity Dharma-heir, Illuminator of the Dao’s Radiance, Perfected Zhang Yu Chu, Forty-Third Celestial Master and Overseer of Daoist Affairs, respectfully inscribed this.

**Completion of the Sixth Scroll of the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern***
**Beginning of the First Scroll of the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern***

Maoshan Supreme Clarity Thirty-Eighth Patriarch Master Jiang Zongying collated and annotated.

**Jade Formula for Reciting the Scripture**

The formula states: First, outside the chamber, hold a tablet before the heart, face forward with eyes closed, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the chamber filled with purple cloud-qi, dense and swirling, crowning and enveloping the body. Envision jade lads and jade maidens attending the scripture on left and right, while the Three Lights and precious mushrooms illumine the chamber with radiance. Upon completing the visualization, knock the teeth three times and recite the Entering-the-Chamber Incantation:

*"The heavens are bright, the qi is clear,
The Three Lights illumine the cavern’s splendor.
Golden chambers and jade halls,
Five mushrooms bloom as treasures.
Mystic clouds and purple canopies
Come to adorn my form.
Immortal lads and jade maidens
Bestow their numinous power upon me.
The Nine Qi ascend in harmony,
The Three Lights unite as one.
Mounting the purple canopy,
I ascend to the imperial court."*

Having recited this, step forward with the right foot to enter the chamber. Pinch the incense three times, knock the teeth three times, and pray:

*"Jade radiance scatters its light,
The Nine Qi bear fragrant mist.
Clouds of incense weave a dense net,
Piercing straight to the Nine Heavens.
The incense-attending golden lad
And the message-bearing jade maiden
Convey my words to the imperial presence,
Granting me long life,
That I may become a transcendent for all generations,
Every wish fulfilled as spoken."*

**Diagram of Visualization for Entering the Chamber and Reciting the Scripture**

After completing the visualization, next recite the Mystic Essence Incantation for Opening the Scripture:

*"Subtle is the gate of the Mystic Origin,
Resplendent and bright, it pervades empty sameness.
The Supreme Dao arises from stillness and silence—
Then shall you behold the Three Pure Palaces.
The Great Dao is perfected here,
Riding the clouds and spurring the dragon.
Transcendents attend the scripture on left and right,
Jade maidens and jade lads.
My body is saved by the elixir of deathlessness,
Loosening the nets to follow the numinous wind.
Seven ancestors return to womb-life,
Becoming the lineage of divine transcendents for all generations."*

Having recited this, face north and knock the teeth thirty-six times. Close the eyes in inner vision, bow the head, and pray:

*"I, the humble mortal so-and-so, born a man of this dusty world, now offer these humble words to the Jade Clarity’s Primordial Sovereign of the Numinous Origin. Having entered the retreat chamber to recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I humbly pray that demonic trials be dispelled, ghostly afflictions and illnesses averted, and that my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved and blessings be born."*

Next, pray:

*"Great Demon Kings of the Six Heavens,
Bound by the desolate void’s restraints,
White-clawed apes and crimson-scaled poisonous dragons,
Guard the four directions,
Safeguarding the ninefold layers.
White eagles cry aloft,
Unsheathing their talons and shaking their manes.
All hidden spirits vanish,
Evil is destroyed and demons shattered.
When the Heavenly Soldiers rage,
The Five Peaks tremble.
Wind and fire launch their campaign,
The Nine Heavens open their court."*

Having recited this, face north and bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel with eyes closed, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and declare:

*"I, the humble mortal so-and-so, born a man of this dusty world, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Most High and Sagely Vast Realized One, the Supreme Dao Lord. Having entered the oratory to burn incense and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I refine my spirit and guard my essence, beseeching the flowering of my destiny’s splendor. May I rise bodily upon the void to bow before the imperial court, and may my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved, ascending to the Hall of Blessings."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Central Yellow Elder of Primordial Simplicity, Sovereign of the Dao. Having entered the chamber to burn incense and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I pray that within my oratory, mushroom blossoms may spontaneously arise, jade radiance and precious luminosity illumine the chamber, and the Three Lights shine with clarity. May I ascend to the Supreme Clarity and unite with the imperial numen, that my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved and I attain long life."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Supreme Clarity’s Marshal of the Hosts of Transcendents, the Long-Life Dharma Master, the Three Heavenly Lords, and Perfected One Wang Baicheng."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Ancestral Master who bestowed the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, the Perfected Sagely Mother, Primordial Sovereign of the Purple Tenuity, Lady Wang."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Master who bestowed the *Great Cyclic Harmony of the Returning Wind*, the Perfected Sagely Mother, Primordial Sovereign of the Central Candidate, Lady Wang. Having entered the chamber to burn incense and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I humbly pray for the harmonization of my three hun-souls and the refinement of my seven po-souls, the sinking of corpse-worms, the radiance of my viscera and bowels, the prevention of all illness, the elimination of calamities, the return of my complexion to that of an infant, and my ascent in broad daylight. May my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved and they ascend to the Hall of Blessings."*

Having recited this, face east and bow four times, burn incense, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and visualize the Six Gates of the Eastern Florescence, governing the Eastern Mound Mountain, encircling three thousand *li*. Within the gates stand the Three Offices, arrayed in perfect order.

The First Palace is the Azure Palace of the Square Reservoir, governed by the Azure Lad, the High Minister.
The Second Palace is the Azure Palace of Jade Preservation, governed by the High Minister, Great Marshal of the Hosts, and Perfected Master Gao Chen.
The Third Palace is the Azure Palace of Jade Florescence, governed by the Little Lad of Azure Florescence of the Eastern Sea.

Next, visualize and recite the names of the Six Gates and their gatekeepers:

The Eastern Azure Florescence Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Qiu Boyuan.
The Southern Spirit Florescence Jade Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Wang Zusi.
The Western Jade Cavern Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Yu Shangjie.
The Northern Jade Yin Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Shi Shaohua.
The Southeastern Heavenly Pass Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Wen Wuche.
The Northeastern Cold Water Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Tong Lindu.

Next, knock the teeth three times and pray facing upward:

*"Supreme Clarity’s Mystic Dawn,
Three Palaces and Six Gates,
Record my jade name,
Send down my spirit-transcendents.
Dragon skirts and feathered regalia
Adorn my body.
As I recite the cavern’s chapters,
May they resound through the Nine Heavens.
Ascending to the Jade Clarity,
I submit my writ to the Eastern Florescence.
My name is carved on golden tablets,
That I may long be an imperial guest."*

Having recited this, swallow the qi nine times, face east, burn incense, bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Supreme Clarity’s Ninefold Subtlety, the Great Perfected Jade Preserver King, the Golden Watchtower’s High Minister and Great Controller of Destinies, Perfected Master Gao Chen, and the Great Lord of the Eastern Sea’s Jade Clarity and Azure Florescence, the Little Lad."*

Having recited this, burn incense again, bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

With utmost sincerity, I, so-and-so, reverently address the Supreme Clarity’s Great Non-Being, the Eastern Aurora’s Fusang Vermilion Grove Great Emperor, and the Supreme Dao Lord.

Having recited this, burn incense again, bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

With utmost sincerity, I, so-and-so, reverently address the Ancestral Master, the Southern Culmen’s Purple Perfected Supreme Clarity Dao Lord; the Grand Tenuity’s Jade Clarity Sagely Empress; the Golden Watchtower’s High Preserver, Eastern Florescence Dao Lord; and the Golden Watchtower’s Grand Master, Supreme Clarity Immortal Marquis. Now entering the chamber, I recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Supreme Clarity Great Cavern Perfected Scripture*. May the dawn’s radiance shine forth, illuminating my body; may my viscera and organs flourish; may calamities and misfortunes dissipate; may my seven ancestors return to the womb and together ascend the cloud chariot.

Having recited this, burn incense again, bow in reverence before the scripture, and gently knock the teeth fourteen times, then pray:

Supreme Unity Emperor Lord,
Imperial Unity Mysterious Scripture,
Five Numinous Ones scatter their effulgence,
Dense and penetrating through the Three Clarities.
Jade lads and jade maidens,
Burn incense and attend the numinous.
May my highest aspirations be declared,
That I may merge my form with theirs,
Becoming an immortal,
And long enjoy felicity and purity.

Having recited this, knock the teeth fourteen times again, then softly recite the *Casket-Opening Incantation*:

Jade Emperor’s supreme dharma,
Ascends to the Three Clarities.
On this auspicious day of purification,
I dare open the divine scripture.
Ten thousand trials concealed,
All shall succeed as I direct.
Jade lads stand guard,
Jade maidens scatter fragrance.
Voices numbering five hundred million,
Resound through the ten thousand numina.
Supreme report to the Three Origins,
Grant me long life eternal.

Having recited this, knock the teeth twenty times, then bow in reverence again. Next, offer three pinches of upper-grade incense, ascend the seat, sit upright, face north, knock the teeth thirty-two times, swallow saliva thirty-two times, and with eyes closed, visualize the Imperial Unity Honored Lord.

Next, envision the disciple’s head as true azure, like jasper; the two shoulders as cinnabar; the two feet as snow. Clad in a nine-colored feathered robe, draped with a dragon-patterned mantle, crowned with a Jade Clarity coronet, holding a nine-colored staff. A green dragon attends to the left, a white tiger guards the right; a canopy of blossoms shades the head, and below sits a lion. Immortal lads attend with incense, jade maidens scatter flowers. Purple clouds billow thickly, filling the chamber; five-colored mystic yellows array before and behind, clearly distinct, all brightly illumined.

Having completed this, knock the teeth thirty-six times, then softly recite the *Three Heavens Demon-Quelling Incantation*:

Northern Emperor, Great Demon King,
Before the Emperor Lord you serve.
Ghosts of the Yellow Springs’ bends,
Four Luminaries, Fengdu’s peaks.
A thousand demons blend their forms,
Nine heads share one body.
Divine tigers spew their venom,
Severed by thunder’s might.
Divine efficacy utters the curse,
None slain shall be spared.
Grand Tenuity’s command,
Subdues mountains and streams.
Clashing bells cast forth,
Flowing brilliance through the Nine Heavens.
Wind and fire launch their assault,
Divine blades arrayed tenfold.
Malevolent trials subdue and perish,
Ten thousand spirits beheaded and annihilated.
Dare any demonic toxin arise,
Sealed within the Three Passes.
Invoking the Cavern Dharma,
None shall disobey these words.

Having recited this, knock the teeth thirty-six times again, then recite the *Great Cavern Demon-Quelling Divine Wisdom Jade Clarity Hidden Writ*:

Mysterious effulgence scatters at heaven’s edge,
The clear Han thins as clouds retreat.
Wondrous qi illumines the Three Mornings,
Cinnabar clouds radiate the Purple Tenuity.
All heavens unfurl their numinous hues,
Streaming auroras, how they billow.
Divine lamps brighten the Long-Lived Star,
Nether webs emit their luminous glow.
Revolving peaks gird high clouds,
Suspended essence shades the eight directions.
Three Primes open the high void,

My seven ancestors all to become immortals,
Ascending to the Southern Palace,
To present themselves in audience before the Imperial Dawn.

Then strike the teeth three times and swallow saliva three times.

*Highest Clarity Great Cavern True Scripture, Scroll Six*
Collated by Jiang Zongying, the thirty-eighth patriarchal master of Maoshan Highest Clarity"

The Scripture of the Twenty-Nine Perfected Lords of the Dark Continent, Divine Controller of Prohibitions, Chapter Thirty-Seven: The Five Emperors

Reverently invoke the Black Emperor of the North to safeguard and prosper, styled *Beifa*, guarding the bladder within both flanks of the adept;
The White Emperor of the West, *Zhang’anxing*, styled *Xihua*, guarding the scrotum within;
The Red Emperor of the South, *Changlaijue*, styled *Nanhe*, guarding the mouth and tongue within;
The Bluegreen Emperor of the East, *Diaoliangji*, styled *Qingping*, guarding the exterior of the five viscera;
The Yellow Emperor of the Center, *Hanguanlu*, styled *Zhongxi*, guarding the spleen and stomach within;
The Primordial One, Old Master *Linxufu*, styled *Lingshidao*, guarding the tip of the penis.

One Elder and Five Emperors,
Safeguard the original destiny,
Guard the adept’s bodily form,
Enabling the seven ancestors to escape suffering,
Blessings extending to the nine lineages,
Karmic sins untied,
The root of the womb dispersed.
Swiftly transform the blood and light of the fetal essence into golden liquid and jade spring,
Ascending to the Southern Palace,
To become imperial guests.
I enter the Eight Effulgences,
Turn the jade wheel in return,
Gaze upward to ascend the Nine Heavens,
Becoming an immortal in broad daylight.

Visualize the five-colored divine clouds veiling the crown of the head.
Silently recite the incantation:
The Five Emperors illumine the Perfected,
Assisting the Transcendent Lords of the Mysterious Continent.
The radiance of the Supreme Emperor,
Exhales numinous effulgences to spread the mat.
Obscure and luminous, the divine brilliance,
Wanders behind layered curtains.
The feathered effulgence of the treasure register,
The destiny recorded by the Great One,
The five qi gather the hun-souls,
The three essences secure the po-souls.
The golden immortals refine their countenances,
Arresting the years and reversing whiteness,
Plucking out the roots of darkness,
Dwelling with the sun and moon in one abode.

Next, visualize the five-colored qi entering from the adept’s *Niwan* palace.
The adept then orally draws in the divine clouds,
Swallows the saliva in six divisions,
Each swallow binding one spirit.

First swallow: the Black Emperor,
Black clouds descend to fill the bladder within both flanks,
Exiting from the back of the heart.
Second swallow: the White Emperor,
White clouds descend to fill the scrotum,
Exiting from the right shoulder,
The spirit’s crown bearing the moonlight.
Third swallow: the Red Emperor,
Red clouds descend to fill the mouth and tongue,
Exiting one inch below the hairline.
Fourth swallow: the Bluegreen Emperor,
Bluegreen clouds descend to fill the exterior of the five viscera,
Exiting from the left shoulder,
The spirit’s head bearing the sunlight.
Fifth swallow: the Yellow Emperor of the Center,
Yellow clouds descend to fill the spleen and stomach,
Exiting from the navel.
Sixth swallow: the Primordial One, Old Master,
Also yellow clouds,
Descend into the penis,
Exiting beyond the Jade Turtle,
Exhaling in accord with the seasons.

Recite the *Jade Scripture*.
The *Great Cavern Jade Scripture* states:
The Dark Continent severs the Three Fordings,
The feathered effulgence of the vast and boundless courtyard,
The returning clouds fly through layered deserts,
Transforming and blending the myriad essences.
The five clouds and five phases’ qi densely fill the void,
The seven auroras and seven stars’ light falls upon perfect clarity.
Resplendent and remote, O child of seclusion,
*Fanchang* nourishes the heart and spirit, pacifying the Yellow Tranquility.
The Five Elders brandish crimson blossoms,
Scattering fragrance and bearing the five numina.
The golden substance bathes in the Emperor’s River,
Green mists and flowing jade.
The spirits pluck out the accumulated Three Paths,
The immortal embryo entwines the adept’s form.

The Perfected King of Jade Purity of the Highest Clarity supplicates:
The supreme treasure moon of the Nine Perfected,
The solar brilliance transforms the jade chamber.
Inhaling and exhaling the Purple Tenuity,
The Great Primeval Unity of the Supreme Emperor.
Eight mists arise in clusters,
A hundred spirits manifest their awe-inspiring might.
The nine hun-souls separate and unite,
The Three Luminaries shine together.
The celestial sovereign’s cinnabar spirit abides in the origin,
Purple mists swirl and billow.
The five spirits present the chart,
The primal mandate remains unbroken.
Transforming and entering the Nine Palaces,
Clad in vermilion robes,
Girded with tiger tally,
Flowing clouds embroider the mantle,
Curtains of sparkling gems,
Five colors wandering,
The sun and moon illuminate and inspect.
Escorting east and west,
The divine court’s inner sweet wine,
Dispelling thirst and hunger.
The Three and Five return in cycles,
Revolving the hidden mechanism of the celestial sphere,
Circulating through the Great One,
Generating and balancing the Two Modes.

The Highest Perfected King of the Divine Empyrean of Jade Purity supplicates:
The Great One transforms the Six Harmonies,
The five spirits nourish the *Niwan*.
The seven essences extinguish the Three Paths,
The blood corpse blocks the lower pass.
The Three Girdles face the imperial Perfected,
Plucking and hewing the root of the womb-tree.
The Venerable One is styled *Divine Ancestor*,
Of one heart with the Primordial Simplicity Lord.
The Celestial Sovereign enters the Great Clarity,
The Five Elders uphold the talismanic script.
Generation upon generation ascends the Feathered Palace,
The resplendent sun chariot at midday.
The Primordial King first illumines the essence,
Securing my original destiny gate.
Protecting and assisting the ministers of the Lower Prime,
Circulating the green qi,
Returning to the Upper Valley, the Lower Mystery assisting the ministers,
Styled *Xuanjing*, the dark effulgence reflecting spirit and form.
Morning ascent to the Supreme Wheel,
The sun and moon paired with jade girdles,
Years divided by the Two Effulgences.
The cinnabar script within the Jade Hall,
Positioned as a celestial sovereign,
An immortal of the Highest Clarity.
To the left, grasping the Feathered Terrace youth,
To the right, lifting the Golden Countenance Immortal.

Conclude by softly reciting:
The inner sound of heaven,
Opens the divine blossom,
The Great Primal Origin.
The outer sound of earth,
Dispels the Three Poisons,
Fortune’s vehicle returns.

The Jade Talisman of the Five Emperors for Dispelling Demons
Instructions state:
Inscribe in yellow upon white silk and wear it. Visualize and invoke the inner secret names of the Five Emperors to guard the gates of my entire body.

Then strike the teeth five times and swallow saliva five times.

*Highest Clarity Great Cavern True Scripture, Scroll Six*
Collated by Jiang Zongying, the thirty-eighth patriarchal master of Maoshan Highest Clarity.

The Scripture of the Great Primal Dawn, the Jade Portal of the Lofty Chamber of Mount Emei, the Lord of Supreme Simplicity, Chapter Thirty-Eight: The Imperial Ministers

Reverently invoke:
The First Imperial Minister of the Mud-Pill Palace above, *Zhaole Jing*, whose secret name is *Zhongxuan Sheng*;
The Central Assistant Minister of the Crimson Palace, *Zhongguang Jian*, whose secret name is *Sihua Ling*;
The Lower Supporting Minister of the Yellow Court, *Guishang Ming*, whose secret name is *Guxia Xuan*.

Let the Three Spirits guard the adept’s entry into the Chamber of the Imperial One, preserving their name in the registers of the Nine Heavens. The gates of death shall be extinguished, and transcendence to the Imperial One achieved.

With true concentration, visualize:
The First Imperial Minister of the Mud-Pill Palace above, *Zhaole Jing*;
The Central Assistant Minister of the Crimson Palace, *Zhongguang Jian*;
The Lower Supporting Minister of the Yellow Court, *Guishang Ming*.
The qi of the Three Perfected coalesces into clouds of azure, white, and yellow, shrouding the crown of the head.

Then silently recite the incantation:
The Three Perfected engender the Great Non-Being,
The Jade Portal reflects the dawn’s radiance,
The Supreme Simplicity pervades the cavern’s void,
The cinnabar spirit gleams in the vermilion vale.
Turn the spirit to the ninefold palace,
Within, the chant unfurls the jade blossom.
The hundred passages receive the divine fluid,
Prolonging life’s splendor like the three boughs.
My body ascends to Jade Clarity,
Seven ancestors escape the dark realm.
Eternally preserved beyond kalpas’ end,
For ten thousand generations, I am of the immortals’ lineage.

Next, visualize the three-colored cloud-qi entering through the adept’s Mud-Pill Palace. The adept then inhales the divine cloud and swallows saliva thrice, forming the Three Spirits, which descend to the adept’s Three Officials and the Chamber of the Imperial One of their original destiny, emanating from one *cun* below the heart in a clockwise exhalation.

Recite the Jade Scripture.
The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern states:
Great Non-Being, Supreme Simplicity,
The cavern’s scene is profoundly mysterious.
Humankind assumes celestial form,
The Upper Dao resides in the Mud-Pill Palace.
Nine palaces arrayed in order,
The cinnabar tower of the Cinnabar Field Palace, five chambers.
The Infant’s six qi,
Abundantly moistening the limpid abyss.
The Great One coagulates the blood,
The Controller of Destiny anchors the soul.
Peach and Health prepare the po,
Nurturing the radiance of the Gate of Life.
The Noble Son bears the essence,
The cavern’s yang recalls the spirit.
The Nine Perfected guard the bones,
The Supreme Simplicity governs the true.
A hundred joints, ten thousand fluids,
A thousand gates open and close.
Above, repose in the sun and moon,
The Five Emperors and Nine Dawns.
The five viscera in tranquil stillness,
Blossoms arise from the jade root.
The Stomach Palace, vermilion intestines,
Generate blood, dredging the source.
The Three Destinies attain longevity,
Nurturing and protecting the Great Wholeness.
The adept gains a divine name,
Ascending as an immortal lord.

The Highest Supreme Jade Clarity King’s Invocation states:
The Imperial One blends the Nine Mysteries,
The Supreme Simplicity’s quintessence of fivefold radiance.
Precious plumes feast in the Jade Hall,
The Eight Winds fan the Great Clarity.
On high, ride the primal effulgence,
Treading the flourishing numen, ascending the Brahma realm.
The Seven Transformations descend beneath the purple portal,
The Nine Blends purify the Five Emperors.
The body generates the six-colored luminaries,
Golden reflections stream the spirit’s form.
Permeated within by the primordial qi,
Inscribed in gold upon the Jade Emperor’s court.

The Highest Dawn Effulgence Jade Clarity King’s Invocation states:
The numinous cloud first divides,
White qi billows in purity.
Blending the Nine Mysteries,
The Three and Five flow in transformation.
The Imperial One releases form,
Transcending to the celestial path.
The Great One breathes,
The fivefold radiance solidifies.
The Controller of Destiny presides at midday,
The White Prime governs the day’s end.
At midday, still the heart,
The heart’s mystery subtly awakens.
At dusk, conceal within the Mud-Pill Palace,
The hundred spirits proclaim.
The Two Palaces may attain longevity,
Heart and brain may endure forever.

Conclude by softly reciting:
The inner sound of heaven,
Ascends the flourishing jade, the Lord of a Hundred Paths.
The outer sound of earth,
Attains union, ascending the divine realm.

The Jade Talisman of the Three-One Imperial Ministers for Dispelling Demons
Instructions state:
Inscribe in vermilion upon yellow silk and wear it. Visualize and invoke the inner secret names of the Three Ministers to guard my original destiny, protect my Imperial Chamber, and secure my name in the registers of the Nine Heavens, extinguishing the gates of death.

Then strike the teeth thrice and swallow saliva thrice.

*Highest Clarity Great Cavern True Scripture, Scroll Six*
Collated by Jiang Zongying, the thirty-eighth patriarchal master of Maoshan Highest Clarity.

The Scripture of the Nine Numinous Perfected Immortal Mother, the Azure Gold Elixir August Sovereign, Chapter Thirty-Nine: The Venerable Sovereign of the Primordial One

Reverently invoke the Great Cavern Primordial One, the Supreme Numinous Sovereign of Grand Simplicity—Father Tranquility and Mother Essence, the dual union of the two, the vast convergence of the hundred perfected, the revolving inception of the One. The body coalesces into mist, transforming the fetal primordial infant. The radiant treasures of sun and moon illumine my corporeal form. The Great One abides above, merging with the August Emperor. The Mud-Pill Palace preserves jade, the five viscera blossom with splendor, ever conjoined with sun and moon. Grasping the Cavern Scripture, one ascends as an Immortal Duke, rising at dawn to the Highest Clarity. Thirty-nine chapters, golden talismans of the Feathered Court.

In profound meditation, visualize the Great Cavern Primordial One, Sovereign Father Tranquility, within the true qi. The qi of five-colored purple clouds enshrouds the crown. Then silently intone:

Nine Numinous pervades wondrous transformation,
Golden Immortals blend at Fusang’s root.
The Primordial One transmutes as the sun’s spirit,
Conjoined with the numinous Western Elixir August Sovereign.
Above, the Fetal Immortal Mother,
Below, the Regulator of the Divine Clan.
Radiant brilliance transcends the cloud-tips,
In the serene Purple Tenuity Palace.
For me, grasp the register of destiny,
Guard the Three Simplicities’ chamber of truth.
Wondrous effulgences descend from the void,
Refining me to revert to infantile ignorance.
Seven ancestors sever the roots of suffering,
Transcending to the Nine Blessings’ hall.

Next, visualize the five-colored purple clouds entering through the Mud-Pill Palace. Inhale the divine clouds through the mouth, swallowing saliva twelve times, coalescing into a single spirit. The body is clad in a halo of five-hued purple and white mist, the spirit dwelling within its light. It descends into the body’s interior, dispersing qi through the nine apertures, gathering upon the tongue’s tip. Exhale gently in accord with the seasons.

Recite the Jade Scripture.

The Jade Scripture of the Great Cavern states:

Western Origin, Kunlun’s Nine Numinous qi,
Golden Elixir Flowing Clouds Palace, the Queen Mother’s abode.
Above, it revolves at the luminous apex,
Its radiance within the Grand Auroral Mist.
Dynamic, it turns the Nine Heavens’ Dipper wheel;
Quiescent, it sinks to the Eight Currents’ adamantine waters’ depths.
Within the chamber dwells the Fetal Immortal Mother,
Attending the Grand August Emperor’s robe.
Mysterious One, Mysterious One, Laozi’s spirit arises in time,
The Three Elders of Primordial Simplicity unfold.
Left hand grasps my talismanic register,
Right hand bears the Regulator of the Divine Clan.
Together we ascend the numinous dragon’s gate,
Bowing our heads in the Jade Clarity’s chamber.
Uprooting the roots of death and extinction,
Nurturing form within the Three and Five.
Seven ancestors dissolve the knots of the corpse,
Receiving blessings in the luminous Vermilion Quadrant.

The Highest Numinous Empyrean Jade Clarity Sovereign’s invocation states:

Supreme Cavern Illuminated,
Soaring effulgences of the Nine Heavens,
Congealing essence, coagulating qi,
Transforming qi, transmuting spirit.
The Controller of Destiny merges and unites,
Dispersing form into myriad divisions.
A thousand chariots of fiery armor,
Ten thousand riders brandishing banners,
All accompany the Great One,
Ascending to the August Emperor’s presence.
Elder Non-Existent Lord arises as the Emperor’s assistant,
Second Perfected of Crooked Script in the Cinnabar Field.
First, unite with my qi,
Second, unite with my spirit,
Third, unite with my po,
Fourth, unite with my hun,
Fifth, unite with my essence,
Sixth, unite with my body.
My body, sixfold united,
Cavern-spirit awakens to truth.
Eight Effulgences’ empty chariot,
Three Simplicities’ floating wheel.
I and the Primordial One,
Together ascend to the Jade Dawn.
Layered blossoms, branching stems,
Merging with the Heavenly Immortals.
The body possesses the Dao’s register,
The world possesses the root of life.
Golden tablets, feathered talismans,
Names inscribed upon the solar chariot.
Wishes are immediately fulfilled,
Heavenly emoluments flourish.
Desires align with the heart,
Ten thousand blessings fill the gate.
Ever abide with the Supreme,
The Primordial One in the Mud-Pill Palace.
Yin and yang blend and transform,
A hundred spirits entwine.
Recite the scripture ten thousand times,
Cloud chariots come to welcome,
Feasting with the Five Emperors,
The Nine Lords of Sun and Moon.
Attaining the rank of Immortal Duke,
Highest Clarity Perfected.

Conclude by softly reciting:
The inner sound of heaven,
Attains the qi of longevity, receiving the luminous chariot.
The outer sound of earth,
Conjoins with the Elder’s robe, riding through kalpic transformation.

The Jade Talisman of the Great Cavern Primordial One for Dispelling Demons

Instructions state:
Inscribe in purple upon yellow silk and wear it. Visualize and invoke the inner secret names of the Venerable Sovereign to revolve the wind and merge into unity, coalescing into the perfection of the Dao. Grasping the talismanic register, prolonging destiny’s span, undergoing a thousand transformations and myriad changes, ascending into the Nine Profounds. Seven ancestors attain liberation, reverting to the fetal state in the Three Heavens, sharing the Emperor’s repose, all forms becoming immortal.

Then strike the teeth thirty-nine times and swallow saliva thirty-nine times.

The Secret Instructions on Revolving the Wind and Merging with the Primordial One:
Upon completing the recitation of the Jade Scripture’s thirty-nine chapters, strike the teeth thirty-nine times. Then close both eyes and visualize the hundred spirits transforming into white qi, chaotic as white clouds, emerging from the primordial void to enter the mouth, dense and lingering for a long while.

Perceive the white qi emanating from the lower body, from the Jade Stem, from the soles of both feet, and from the palms of both hands, enveloping the entire body. Above and below, hands and feet merge into one with the white qi, ascending and descending indistinctly.

After a long while, the white qi suddenly transforms into dense purple clouds, entering the head through the mouth and filling the five viscera within the abdomen.

After another long while, the purple clouds emerge from the soles of both feet, the palms of both hands, the lower body, and the Jade Stem, enveloping the entire body in dense mist. Above and below, they merge with the form, indistinct from one another.

Presently, visualize the purple cloud qi filling the left and right, permeating the chamber. Then perceive wind qi issuing from the mouth, fanning the purple mist, causing it to revolve and intertwine. Suddenly, it coalesces into a perfected person, male in form, resembling a newborn infant, four inches in height, named the Great Cavern Primordial One Venerable Sovereign. His name is Father Tranquility Abiding, his style Mother Essence Prolonged. He guards the life-and-death barrier, the revolving wind of the host of spirits merging and transforming to form this Venerable Sovereign of the Primordial One.

The Venerable Sovereign enters through the mouth beneath the tongue, ascending directly into the Purple Chamber’s Sixfold Union Palace, seated upright facing outward.

In his left hand, the Venerable Sovereign holds my five talismans; in his right hand, my five registers.

To the left of the Venerable Sovereign’s mouth shines sunlight, nine fen in diameter; to the right, moonlight, one cun in diameter.

The Venerable Sovereign exhales the revolving wind’s qi, blowing upon the light of sun and moon, which transforms into dense white or purple hues.

The light and qi descend into my five viscera, six bowels, and hundred joints, illuminating the entire body within with penetrating clarity, so that inside and out appear as bright as daylight. After a long while, I suddenly forget my own form. When the ritual is complete and the spirit and qi have settled, I feel my body light and pure, my spirit refreshed and expansive.

Then I click my teeth thirty-nine times, rub my face with both hands, and recite the following ode:

The Most High instructs me,
To recite the *Dongzhen* scripture,
Jade tones harmonize with golden notes,
Rising to fill the Court of Supreme Nothingness.
They untie knots and disperse hidden misfortunes,
Liberate the spirits of seven generations of ancestors,
Return to the womb and meet in the Southern Palace,
That each generation may bear a jade name.
The Three Paths’ roots of sin are extinguished,
And through cyclic transformation, one ascends to the Upper Clarity.

After reciting the scripture, I restore the incense burner and pray:

I, your humble servant [Name], having entered the oratory on this auspicious day to perform the recitation of the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Supreme Clarity Great Cavern True Scripture*, now offer my wishes. May the immortal spirits and immortal officials, the Golden Lads and messengers, the Five Thearchs, the gods and immortals of the Five Marchmounts, the perfected of the Three Heavens, the True Spirits, the Lords of the Left and Right Dragon-Tiger, the immortals of heaven and earth, the Five Numinous Fragrance Officials, and the mighty spirits attendant upon the scripture, command the summoning of the upright qi from the ten directions. May the golden liquid, cinnabar, and jade mushrooms naturally arise, and may the Nine Mysteries and Jade Perfected gather in this hall of purification. Together, may they bathe my body, so that I may study the Dao and attain the Dao, seek immortality and attain immortality, soar through the Great Void, and ascend in radiance through the Nine Heavens. May jade lads and jade maidens attend me with fragrant incense, and may they report all that I have petitioned and vowed here, directly to the presence of the Lofty Perfected, the Jade Thearch, the Supreme Dao, and the myriad sagely hosts.

When the prayer is finished, I bow in reverence to the four directions and rise.

The Twenty-Third Patriarch of Mount Mao’s Shangqing Lineage, Master Guanmiao Zhu Ziying, presents *The Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture*

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture*
**Full Title:** *The Supreme Purity Great Cavern Perfection Scripture in Thirty-Nine Chapters*

Tradition holds that in the third year of the Xingning reign of the Eastern Jin (365 CE), the Shangqing Immortals, led by Lady Wei, descended to transmit this scripture to the Daoist Yang Xi, making it the foundational text of the Shangqing lineage. The original comprised a single scroll. The extant version, preserved in the Mao Mountain lineage’s altar edition, spans six scrolls. It was collated by the Southern Song Shangqing Patriarch Jiang Zongying and finalized by the early Ming Zhengyi Celestial Master Zhang Yuchu.

**Source Text:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Cavern Perfection Division, Original Texts Category.

chunks.original_text: 茅山上清二十三代宗师观妙先生朱自英述 夫道生於无，潜众灵而莫测； 神凝於虚，妙万变而无方，杳冥有精而泰定发光，太玄无际而致虚守静，是之谓大洞者欤。 及其敛精聚神，御祖炁以徊旋； 炼神会道，运祥风而鼓舞； 无中欻有，呼吸散万神之形； 动极复静，恍惚围帝一之妙，是之谓徊风混合者欤。 为天地普植之本，帝圣造化之原。 人之生也，禀气於太极，而动静法乎天地； 肇灵於一元，而阖辟体乎阴阳。 故上清三十九帝皇，回真下映，入兆身中三十九户，於是各由其所贯之户，着经一章。 其辞幽奥，以用领括百神，招真辟非，所谓庆云开生门，祥烟塞死户者，此欤。 故中央黄老元素道君，总彼列圣之奥旨，集成大洞之真经，故曰三十九章经也。 又有徊风帝一、高元雄一、五老雌一，是三经者，所以辅乎三十九章之尊经耳。 夫道有三奇，第一之奇《大洞真经三十九章》，第二之奇《五老雌一宝经》，第三之奇《素灵大有妙经》。 故三十九章者，乃九天之奇诀，上元太素君金书之首经也。 一名三天龙书，一名九天太真道经。 此经之作，乃自玄微十方，元始天王所运炁撰集也。 西王母从元始天王受道，乃共刻北元天中录那邪国，灵镜人鸟之山，阇莱之岫。 乃於虚室之中，聚九玄正一之炁，结而成书，字径一丈，于今存焉。 元始天王又以传上清八真中央黄老君，使教授下方当为真人，上升三辰者焉。 中央黄老君隐禁此经，世无知者，故人间地上五岳天中，永无此经。 上清天真尤所宝秘，唯太玄有金阁玉名，琼札紫简，三元有并晨秘箓，丹台有黄文之字，当必为真人者，乃得受之尔。 是经也，上皇之道标，紫晨之妙篇，制命九天之阶，征召五帝之灵，逸徊风之混合，凝九转於玄精，交会雌雄，混合万神，森罗幽郁，琼响太真，运辟非於明梁，通易有於玄门，洞德刅以造妙，濯耀罗而映云。 太汉为灵关之炁，无刅为浩劫之年，巍巍神馆，万真之渊，金房焕赫，郁乎上清。 其旨幽微，难可究详。 兆能长斋，绝志人间，诵玉篇於曲室，叩琼音以震灵，则真人定箓於东华，七玄更润於紫房，制魔王以威神，摄五帝以卫身，万遍周而肉身飞，七转召而司命至。 此大洞之奇章，总亿道而反生，自无奇毛异质，金骨玉名，皆不得有妄披於灵文，其禁悉依九真明科。 兆当苦斋三年，乃得读之。 诵咏此章，万遍既毕，中央黄老道君上奏，太上命丹飙绿盖之车，九灵使者太乙司命，来迎於子。 於是五老翼轩，八风扇羽，神雷前驱，玉华扶毂，乘云驾龙，即日升天，诣太素三元君宫中受书。 是谓上登上清，受书太极，拜为高仙左卿者也。 兆若但有此经，不得读之者，太微天帝君拔出死简，於授经之始刊定真箓，於造斋之初度籍太极，刻名东华，关奏太上，录封龟台，万神千灵自称兆为九玄大夫，位准太清仙伯也。 受经之格，一依九真明科，兆宜遵焉。 后序《易》曰：大哉乾元，万物资始。 又曰：乾道变化，各正性命，保合大和，乃利贞。 先儒释之曰：何谓元，是不可言也。 其阴阳未形之初乎。 天之所赋为命，物之所受为性。 性命妙矣，保合大和，而后能利贞。 大洞一经，其本乎回元复命。 世之议者皆曰：道妙於虚无，神潜於欻有。

Master Zhu Ziying of the Twenty-Third Generation of Maoshan Shangqing Lineage, the Master Who Contemplates the Wondrous, states:

The Dao arises from Non-Being, abiding in the hidden numinous yet unfathomable;
The spirit congeals in Emptiness, wondrously transforming the myriad changes without fixed form.
In the profound obscurity, essence abides, and in supreme tranquility, radiance emerges;
In the boundless Great Mystery, one attains Emptiness and preserves Stillness—
This is called the *Great Cavern*.

When essence is gathered and spirit is concentrated, one rides the primordial qi in cyclic rotation;
When spirit is refined and the Dao is realized, auspicious winds are set in motion and dance.
From Non-Being, Being suddenly arises, and through breath, the myriad spirits’ forms disperse;
When movement reaches its extreme, stillness returns, and in the indistinct, the wondrous unity of the Imperial One is encircled—
This is called the *Cyclic Wind Unified*.

It is the root of universal propagation for Heaven and Earth, the origin of creation for emperors and sages.
Humans are born, receiving qi from the Supreme Ultimate, their movement and stillness patterned after Heaven and Earth;
They originate in the One Primordial, their opening and closing embodying Yin and Yang.
Thus, the Thirty-Nine August Lords of Shangqing reflect their true forms downward, entering the thirty-nine portals within the adept’s body.
Each portal, according to its corresponding passage, bears one chapter of the scripture.
Its words are profound and abstruse, serving to command the hundred spirits, summon the true, and repel the false—
What is called "auspicious clouds open the Gate of Life, and propitious mists seal the Portal of Death" refers to this.

Therefore, the Central Yellow Elder of the Primordial Essence Dao Lord synthesized the esoteric intentions of the host of sages and compiled the *True Scripture of the Great Cavern*, hence its name: *The Thirty-Nine Chapters Scripture*.
Additionally, there are the *Cyclic Wind Imperial One*, the *Lofty Primordial Mighty One*, and the *Five Elders Feminine One*—these three scriptures serve to supplement the venerable *Thirty-Nine Chapters*.

The Dao possesses three marvels:
The first marvel is the *True Scripture of the Great Cavern in Thirty-Nine Chapters*;
The second marvel is the *Precious Scripture of the Five Elders Feminine One*;
The third marvel is the *Wondrous Scripture of the Vast and Subtle Primordial Numinosity*.

Thus, the *Thirty-Nine Chapters* is the esoteric formula of the Nine Heavens, the foremost scripture of the Supreme Primordial Lord, inscribed in golden characters.
It is also called the *Dragon Script of the Three Heavens* and the *True Dao Scripture of the Nine Heavens*.
This scripture was composed by the Primordial Heavenly King, who circulated qi across the ten directions of the Mysterious Subtle.
The Queen Mother of the West received the Dao from the Primordial Heavenly King and, together, they inscribed it in the Northern Primordial Heaven, in the Land of Luyena, upon the Spirit Mirror Mountain of the Bird-Men, within the Grotto of Shelai.
In a chamber of Emptiness, they gathered the qi of the Ninefold Mysterious Unity, coalescing it into a book. The characters measured a *zhang* in height, and it remains preserved to this day.
The Primordial Heavenly King further transmitted it to the Central Yellow Elder of the Eight Perfected of Shangqing, instructing him to teach it to those below who would become true persons and ascend to the Three Luminaries.

This scripture was concealed and guarded by the Central Yellow Elder, unknown to the world. Thus, in the mortal realm, upon the Five Sacred Peaks and within the celestial precincts of Heaven, it has never been present.
The Perfected of the Shangqing Heaven treasure and secrete it; only in the Great Mystery are there golden pavilions and jade tablets, purple slips and cinnabar records.
In the Three Origins, there are the *Secret Registers of the Conjoined Dawn*; in the Cinnabar Terrace, the yellow characters of the scripture.
Only those destined to become true persons may receive it.

This scripture is the banner of the Dao of the Supreme August, the wondrous text of the Purple Dawn.
It governs the ranks of the Nine Heavens, summons the numinous powers of the Five Emperors,
Unifies the *Cyclic Wind* in its primordial harmony, coagulates the ninefold transmutations in mysterious essence,
Conjoins the feminine and masculine, unites the myriad spirits,
Arrayed in profound solemnity, resonating with the jade tones of the Great Perfected.
It dispels the false in the Luminous Beam, communicates the mutable in the Mysterious Gate,
Penetrates virtue to attain the wondrous, washes radiance to illumine the clouds.
The Great Han becomes the qi of the Numinous Pass; the Boundless becomes the years of the Vast Kalpa.
Majestic are the spirit halls, the abyss of the myriad Perfected;
Resplendent the golden chambers, flourishing in the Shangqing Heaven.

Its purport is subtle and profound, difficult to exhaust in detail.
If the adept can maintain long-term purification, severing worldly attachments,
Recite the jade chapters in the secluded chamber, and invoke the jade tones to stir the numinous,
Then the true person’s register will be established in the Eastern Florescence,
The Seven Mysteries will be further refined in the Purple Chamber,
The Demon Kings will be subdued by numinous might,
The Five Emperors will be harnessed to guard the body.
After ten thousand recitations, the fleshly body will ascend;
After seven invocations, the Controller of Destiny will arrive.
These are the marvelous chapters of the *Great Cavern*, which gather the myriad Dao to return to life.
Without extraordinary feathers or anomalous forms, without golden bones or jade names,
None may rashly peruse the numinous text—its prohibitions strictly follow the *Luminous Regulations of the Nine Perfected*.

The adept must undergo three years of arduous purification before being permitted to read it.
Upon completing ten thousand recitations of these chapters, the Central Yellow Elder Dao Lord will memorialize above,
And the Supreme Lord will command the cinnabar-gale chariot with its green canopy,
While the Nine Numinous Envoys and the Controller of Destiny of the Great Unity come to welcome the adept.
Thus, the Five Elders will flank the carriage, the Eight Winds will fan their feathers,
Divine thunder will lead the way, jade splendor will support the wheels.
Riding clouds and driving dragons, the adept will ascend to Heaven that very day,
Proceeding to the palace of the Three Primordial Lords of the Supreme Simplicity to receive the scripture.
This is called ascending to the Shangqing Heaven, receiving the scripture in the Supreme Ultimate,
And being appointed as the Left Minister of the Lofty Immortals.

If the adept merely possesses this scripture but does not recite it,
The Heavenly Emperor of the Supreme Tenuity will strike the adept’s name from the Register of Death.
At the outset of scripture transmission, the true register is established;
At the beginning of the purification rite, the Supreme Ultimate is invoked to inscribe the name in the Eastern Florescence.
A memorial is presented to the Supreme Lord, and the name is recorded in the Tortoise Terrace.
The myriad spirits and thousand numina will then address the adept as the *Grand Master of the Nine Mysteries*,
Ranking equivalent to the *Immortal Earl of the Supreme Purity*.

The protocols for receiving the scripture strictly adhere to the *Luminous Regulations of the Nine Perfected*; the adept should comply accordingly.

**Postface**
The *Book of Changes* states: "Great indeed is the Primal Qi of Qian! All things owe their beginning to it."
It further states: "The Dao of Qian transforms and changes, each attaining its proper nature and destiny. Preserving and uniting the Great Harmony, only then is there benefit and correctness."
The earlier scholars explained: "What is called *yuan*? It is that which cannot be spoken—perhaps the state before Yin and Yang took form."
What Heaven bestows is *ming* (destiny); what beings receive is *xing* (nature).
Nature and destiny are wondrous; only by preserving and uniting the Great Harmony can there be benefit and correctness.
The *Great Cavern Scripture* fundamentally concerns the return to the origin and the restoration of destiny.
Those who discuss it in the world all say: "The Dao is wondrous in Emptiness and Non-Being; the spirit is hidden in the sudden arising of Being."

chunks.original_text: 殊不知未有天地，先有此道。 沬泗门人之称夫子曰：性与天道，不可得而闻也。 盖此道即惟精惟一之妙，自尧舜禹三圣相传，皆心心符印，未尝须臾离也。 迨至春秋，世降俗末，指为甚高难行之事，无所适从，故夫子亦罕言之。 及其颜子坐忘，曾子一唯，岂复有异闻乎。 是经之旨，乃存心养性以事天，聚精会神而合道，与夫子操则存舍则亡之说，初不相背。 顷自中央黄老君隐禁之后，世亦无知者。 故人间地上，五岳山中，永无此经。 后世之人，莫闻大道，恣情欲海，汨志尘波，夫其所谓保太和、正性命者，良可悯也。 茅山上清宗坛，历代传授，千余岁间，才三十八人。 盖其发天地未形之蕴，析父母媾精之妙，故宜隐秘，不轻卑传。 咸淳仲春，玉海冲妙宗师，来游九华，因访道室，语及此事闻者几希，惧将泯绝，欲广其传焉。 公端以三生结习之绿，蒙师指教，感恩莫酬，敬命厥工，用锓诸梓，以承其志，与天下学士共之。 必有赍宝，效心盟天而传者，愿力行之，以昌此道。 咸淳壬申上元日，嗣法程公端焚香敬书。 性命之赋於物也，至大至微，至轻至重，有无不可涯涘，而其不遗於道，悉可见可求矣。 故得夫己者明，然后知天地万汇，皆一物也。 彼之虚灵神妙者，吾岂不具之。 既具之，则可见可求，曷不与至大至微，至轻至重者同所赋有，而不昧焉。 道之所谓经者，发乎天真之音，三炁之文，莫不由上帝真仙宣演，而后传之下世也。 其音闻於无音，其文质於无文，判於溟涬混沌之始，而其开廓生植之着，则可闻可质矣，谓之经也。 启己之藏，说已之经，发其至真之奥，以开人之顽蔽，岂不物物具夫此经也哉。 大洞真经，凡三十九章，皆修炼之旨。 行之而有成者，魏、杨，郭、许者是也。 其隐乎高虚，达乎明彻，或谨於礼谒，或颐於采服，工用各有同异，非可泛易求之。 盖修炼之道，必本於养炁存神，逐物去虑后炁凝神化，物绝虑融，无毫发之间碍，而后复乎溟涬混沌之始。 故不饥渴、不生灭，与云行空蹑者游，於或往或来，而莫知其极也。 经之行世，敬善之士必思广其传。 原其存心於善，一也。 闽道者熊常一，求道有年，募工刊是经，来请一言。 噫！ 知经之为道，而从之也众矣，能行经之道，是不徒从之也。 太上之设教，蠢动之类，莫不受其泽，行之千万世而不息者，有自来矣。 其几何人能信於己而力修之？ 能信而修之，何患其不得乎经也。 矧出乎有无涯泪之表，而神妙不特乎经之谓也。 持经者尚当勉於余言乎。 正一嗣教道合无为阐祖光范真人，领道教事，四十三代天师张宇初谨书。 上清大洞真经卷之六  竟 上清大洞真经卷之一

Before heaven and earth existed, this Dao already was. The disciples of the Mo and Si schools spoke of Confucius, saying: "His nature and the Dao of Heaven—these could not be heard." Yet this Dao is none other than the wondrous subtlety of "only the refined, only the unified," transmitted heart-to-heart by the Three Sages—Yao, Shun, and Yu—each in unbroken accord, never for an instant apart. By the Spring and Autumn period, as the age declined and customs decayed, it was regarded as something loftily impracticable, leaving people at a loss, and so the Master seldom spoke of it. Yet when Yanzi sat in forgetfulness and Zengzi responded with singular devotion, did they hear anything different? The purport of this scripture is to preserve the heart and nurture nature in serving Heaven, to gather essence and unite spirit in harmonizing with the Dao—entirely consistent with the Master’s teaching that "when you grasp it, it remains; when you release it, it vanishes."

Since the Yellow and Lao Lords of the Central Realm withdrew into seclusion, the world has known nothing of this. Thus, among the earthly realms of humanity and the five sacred mountains, this scripture has vanished forever. Later generations, never hearing of the Great Dao, have abandoned themselves to the sea of desires, drowning their aspirations in the dusty waves. How pitiable are those who would preserve the Great Harmony and rectify nature and destiny!

At the Shangqing Ancestral Altar of Mount Mao, transmission has spanned over a thousand years, yet only thirty-eight individuals have received it. For it reveals the hidden truths of heaven and earth before form arose and dissects the mysteries of the union of father and mother’s essences—thus it must remain concealed, never lightly or carelessly passed on.

In the second lunar month of the Xianchun reign, the Perfected Master of Jade Ocean’s Profound Mystery visited Jiuhua Mountain. While visiting a Daoist chamber, he spoke of this matter, and few were those who heard. Fearing its imminent extinction, he wished to broaden its transmission. I, Gongduan, bound by the green threads of three lifetimes’ karmic practice, received the Master’s instruction and, overwhelmed with gratitude, commissioned this carving in wood to fulfill his intent, sharing it with scholars across the world. May those who treasure this text, pledging their hearts before Heaven in transmission, vow to practice it and thus flourish this Dao.

On the fifteenth day of the first lunar month in the ren-shen year of the Xianchun reign, the Dharma-heir Cheng Gongduan reverently inscribed this with burning incense.

What is bestowed upon beings as nature and destiny is at once vast and minute, light and weighty, boundless in its presence and absence—yet never apart from the Dao, all may be seen and sought. Thus, one who attains the self becomes enlightened, then knows that heaven, earth, and the ten thousand things are but a single entity. That which is empty, numinous, and wondrous—do I not possess it? Since I possess it, it may be seen and sought. Why should it not share the same endowment as the vast and minute, the light and weighty, without ever being obscured?

What is called a *scripture* of the Dao arises from the sound of celestial truth, the text of the Three Qi. None but the Perfected Immortals of the Supreme Emperor expound it before transmitting it to the world below. Its sound is heard in the absence of sound; its text takes form in the absence of form. It divides at the beginning of the primordial chaos, yet its unfolding and nurturing manifestations may be heard and perceived—hence it is called a *scripture*.

To unlock the treasury within oneself, to expound the scripture within oneself, to reveal its most profound truths and dispel the obstructions of the benighted—is it not that every being possesses this scripture? The *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern* comprises thirty-nine chapters, all concerning the principles of refinement. Those who practice it to completion—such as Wei, Yang, Guo, and Xu—attest to this.

Some ascend to the lofty void, some penetrate to luminous clarity; some are meticulous in ritual observance, some nourish themselves through ingestion—each method has its similarities and differences, and none may be casually pursued. For the path of refinement must be rooted in nurturing qi and preserving spirit. Only after dispelling external distractions and dissolving thoughts does qi congeal and spirit transform. When all things and concerns are severed, and not even a hair’s breadth of obstruction remains, one returns to the primordial chaos. Thus, hunger and thirst vanish, birth and extinction cease. One roams with the clouds drifting through the sky, coming and going without limit.

When such scriptures circulate in the world, those of reverent virtue must consider broadening their transmission. At its core, the intention to preserve goodness is one and the same.

The Daoist Xiong Changyi of Min, who has sought the Dao for years, sponsored the carving of this scripture and requested a preface. Alas! Many know the scripture as the Dao and follow it, yet few truly practice its Way. The teachings established by the Most High extend their grace to all creatures, enduring through countless generations without cease—such is their origin. How many can truly believe in themselves and diligently cultivate it? Those who believe and cultivate—what hinders them from attaining the scripture? How much more does it transcend the bounds of existence and non-existence, its numinous wonders far exceeding what the scripture alone conveys!

Holders of this scripture should take heed of these words.

The Orthodox Unity Dharma-heir, Illuminator of the Dao’s Radiance, Perfected Zhang Yu Chu, Forty-Third Celestial Master and Overseer of Daoist Affairs, respectfully inscribed this.

**Completion of the Sixth Scroll of the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern***
**Beginning of the First Scroll of the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern***

chunks.original_text: 茅山上清三十八代宗师蒋宗瑛校勘 诵经玉诀 诀曰：先於室外秉简当心，临目扣齿三通，存室内有紫云之炁遍满，又郁郁来冠兆身。 存玉童玉女侍经左右，三光宝芝洞焕室内。 存思毕，扣齿三通，念入户咒曰： 天朗炁清，三光洞明，金房玉室，五芝宝生，玄云紫盖，来映我身，仙童玉女，为我致灵，九炁齐景，三光同軿，上乘紫盖，升入帝庭。 毕，先进右足入户，三捻香，扣齿三通，祝曰： 玉华散景，九炁含烟，香云密罗，径冲九天，侍香金童，传言玉女，上闻帝前，令臣长生，世为仙真，随心所愿，莫不如言。 诵经入室存思之图 存思毕，次念开经玄蕴咒曰： 微微玄宗门，焕朗彻空同，至道由静默，当见三素宫，大道於此成，骖景策云龙，左右侍经真，玉女及玉童，身济不死津，解罗顺灵风，七祖返胎生，世为神仙宗。 毕，北向叩齿三十六通，冥目内视，俯心祝曰： 粪土小兆男生臣某，今有微言，上启玉清琼元君，臣今登斋入室，诵咏《 上清大洞真经三十九章》，伏愿驱除魔试，辟却鬼病，臣及七祖罪解福生。 次祝曰： 六天大魔王，受制幽寥无，白距玃兽，赤甲毒龙，镇守四维，备卫九重，白鹰仰鸣，奋爪振豪，万精幽匿，灭邪破妖，天丁一怒，五岳振摇，风火征伐，九天启朝。 毕，北向四拜，三叩齿，长跪临目，叩齿二十四通，启曰： 粪土小兆男生臣某，至心上启高圣万真太上大道君，臣今入靖焚香，诵咏《上清大洞真经三十九章》，炼神保藏， 乞胃管华荣，耸身乘虚，上拜帝庭，臣七祖罪释，上生福堂。 毕，又四拜，长跪启曰： 臣某至心上启中央黄老元素道君，臣今入室焚香披咏《上清大洞真经三十九章》，愿臣靖室之内，芝英自生，玉华宝曜，三光洞明，臣升上清，合同帝灵，使七祖罪解，克获长生。 毕，又四拜，三叩齿，长跪启曰： 臣某至心上启上清总仙大司马，长生法师王三天君栢成上真。 毕，又四拜，三叩齿，长跪启曰： 臣某至心上启降授大洞真经祖师，上真圣母紫微元君王夫人。 毕，又四拜，三叩齿，长跪启曰： 臣某至心上启降授徊风大混合师，上真圣母中候元君王夫人，臣今入室焚香，讽读《 上清大洞真经三十九章》，伏愿调和三魂，制炼七魄，尸虫沉落，腑藏光华，百病不生，灾害消灭，色返婴孩，白日腾翥，愿七祖罪解，上生福堂。 毕，东向四拜，烧香，叩齿三十六通，存东华六门，治东垄山，周回三千里，门内有三官，罗列分明。 第一宫方诸青宫，上相青童君所治。 第二宫玉保青宫，玉保王上相大司马高晨师所治。 第三宫玉华青宫，东海青华小童所治。 次存念六门名，及门郎姓字： 东青华门，门郎丘伯渊。 南神华玉门，门郎王祖思。 西玉洞门，门郎庾尚节。 北玉阴门，门郎史少华。 东南天关门，门郎文五车。 东北寒水门，门郎童林都。 次叩齿三通，仰祝： 上清玄晨，三宫六门，典我玉名，降我神真，龙裙羽章，以给我身，诵咏洞章，朗彻九天，上升玉清，东华投篇，名刻金格，长为帝宾。 毕，咽炁九过，东向烧香，四拜，三叩齿，长跪启曰： 臣某至心上启上清九微太真玉保王，金阙上相大司命高晨师，东海玉明青华小童大君。 毕，又烧香，四拜，三叩齿，长跪启曰：

**Jade Formula for Reciting the Scripture**

The formula states: First, outside the chamber, hold a tablet before the heart, face forward with eyes closed, and knock the teeth three times. Visualize the chamber filled with purple cloud-qi, dense and swirling, crowning and enveloping the body. Envision jade lads and jade maidens attending the scripture on left and right, while the Three Lights and precious mushrooms illumine the chamber with radiance. Upon completing the visualization, knock the teeth three times and recite the Entering-the-Chamber Incantation:

*"The heavens are bright, the qi is clear,
The Three Lights illumine the cavern’s splendor.
Golden chambers and jade halls,
Five mushrooms bloom as treasures.
Mystic clouds and purple canopies
Come to adorn my form.
Immortal lads and jade maidens
Bestow their numinous power upon me.
The Nine Qi ascend in harmony,
The Three Lights unite as one.
Mounting the purple canopy,
I ascend to the imperial court."*

Having recited this, step forward with the right foot to enter the chamber. Pinch the incense three times, knock the teeth three times, and pray:

*"Jade radiance scatters its light,
The Nine Qi bear fragrant mist.
Clouds of incense weave a dense net,
Piercing straight to the Nine Heavens.
The incense-attending golden lad
And the message-bearing jade maiden
Convey my words to the imperial presence,
Granting me long life,
That I may become a transcendent for all generations,
Every wish fulfilled as spoken."*

**Diagram of Visualization for Entering the Chamber and Reciting the Scripture**

After completing the visualization, next recite the Mystic Essence Incantation for Opening the Scripture:

*"Subtle is the gate of the Mystic Origin,
Resplendent and bright, it pervades empty sameness.
The Supreme Dao arises from stillness and silence—
Then shall you behold the Three Pure Palaces.
The Great Dao is perfected here,
Riding the clouds and spurring the dragon.
Transcendents attend the scripture on left and right,
Jade maidens and jade lads.
My body is saved by the elixir of deathlessness,
Loosening the nets to follow the numinous wind.
Seven ancestors return to womb-life,
Becoming the lineage of divine transcendents for all generations."*

Having recited this, face north and knock the teeth thirty-six times. Close the eyes in inner vision, bow the head, and pray:

*"I, the humble mortal so-and-so, born a man of this dusty world, now offer these humble words to the Jade Clarity’s Primordial Sovereign of the Numinous Origin. Having entered the retreat chamber to recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I humbly pray that demonic trials be dispelled, ghostly afflictions and illnesses averted, and that my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved and blessings be born."*

Next, pray:

*"Great Demon Kings of the Six Heavens,
Bound by the desolate void’s restraints,
White-clawed apes and crimson-scaled poisonous dragons,
Guard the four directions,
Safeguarding the ninefold layers.
White eagles cry aloft,
Unsheathing their talons and shaking their manes.
All hidden spirits vanish,
Evil is destroyed and demons shattered.
When the Heavenly Soldiers rage,
The Five Peaks tremble.
Wind and fire launch their campaign,
The Nine Heavens open their court."*

Having recited this, face north and bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel with eyes closed, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and declare:

*"I, the humble mortal so-and-so, born a man of this dusty world, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Most High and Sagely Vast Realized One, the Supreme Dao Lord. Having entered the oratory to burn incense and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I refine my spirit and guard my essence, beseeching the flowering of my destiny’s splendor. May I rise bodily upon the void to bow before the imperial court, and may my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved, ascending to the Hall of Blessings."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Central Yellow Elder of Primordial Simplicity, Sovereign of the Dao. Having entered the chamber to burn incense and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I pray that within my oratory, mushroom blossoms may spontaneously arise, jade radiance and precious luminosity illumine the chamber, and the Three Lights shine with clarity. May I ascend to the Supreme Clarity and unite with the imperial numen, that my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved and I attain long life."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Supreme Clarity’s Marshal of the Hosts of Transcendents, the Long-Life Dharma Master, the Three Heavenly Lords, and Perfected One Wang Baicheng."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Ancestral Master who bestowed the *Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, the Perfected Sagely Mother, Primordial Sovereign of the Purple Tenuity, Lady Wang."*

Having recited this, bow four times again, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Master who bestowed the *Great Cyclic Harmony of the Returning Wind*, the Perfected Sagely Mother, Primordial Sovereign of the Central Candidate, Lady Wang. Having entered the chamber to burn incense and recite the *Thirty-Nine Chapters of the Perfect Scripture of the Great Cavern*, I humbly pray for the harmonization of my three hun-souls and the refinement of my seven po-souls, the sinking of corpse-worms, the radiance of my viscera and bowels, the prevention of all illness, the elimination of calamities, the return of my complexion to that of an infant, and my ascent in broad daylight. May my seven ancestors’ sins be absolved and they ascend to the Hall of Blessings."*

Having recited this, face east and bow four times, burn incense, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and visualize the Six Gates of the Eastern Florescence, governing the Eastern Mound Mountain, encircling three thousand *li*. Within the gates stand the Three Offices, arrayed in perfect order.

The First Palace is the Azure Palace of the Square Reservoir, governed by the Azure Lad, the High Minister.
The Second Palace is the Azure Palace of Jade Preservation, governed by the High Minister, Great Marshal of the Hosts, and Perfected Master Gao Chen.
The Third Palace is the Azure Palace of Jade Florescence, governed by the Little Lad of Azure Florescence of the Eastern Sea.

Next, visualize and recite the names of the Six Gates and their gatekeepers:

The Eastern Azure Florescence Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Qiu Boyuan.
The Southern Spirit Florescence Jade Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Wang Zusi.
The Western Jade Cavern Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Yu Shangjie.
The Northern Jade Yin Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Shi Shaohua.
The Southeastern Heavenly Pass Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Wen Wuche.
The Northeastern Cold Water Gate, guarded by Gatekeeper Tong Lindu.

Next, knock the teeth three times and pray facing upward:

*"Supreme Clarity’s Mystic Dawn,
Three Palaces and Six Gates,
Record my jade name,
Send down my spirit-transcendents.
Dragon skirts and feathered regalia
Adorn my body.
As I recite the cavern’s chapters,
May they resound through the Nine Heavens.
Ascending to the Jade Clarity,
I submit my writ to the Eastern Florescence.
My name is carved on golden tablets,
That I may long be an imperial guest."*

Having recited this, swallow the qi nine times, face east, burn incense, bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

*"I, so-and-so, with utmost sincerity reverently address the Supreme Clarity’s Ninefold Subtlety, the Great Perfected Jade Preserver King, the Golden Watchtower’s High Minister and Great Controller of Destinies, Perfected Master Gao Chen, and the Great Lord of the Eastern Sea’s Jade Clarity and Azure Florescence, the Little Lad."*

Having recited this, burn incense again, bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

With utmost sincerity, I, so-and-so, reverently address the Supreme Clarity’s Great Non-Being, the Eastern Aurora’s Fusang Vermilion Grove Great Emperor, and the Supreme Dao Lord.

Having recited this, burn incense again, bow four times, knock the teeth three times, then kneel and declare:

With utmost sincerity, I, so-and-so, reverently address the Ancestral Master, the Southern Culmen’s Purple Perfected Supreme Clarity Dao Lord; the Grand Tenuity’s Jade Clarity Sagely Empress; the Golden Watchtower’s High Preserver, Eastern Florescence Dao Lord; and the Golden Watchtower’s Grand Master, Supreme Clarity Immortal Marquis.
